@CarlRosell @kentcdodds @Netlify @airtable Ha ha! I know the feeling. I made a tool to generate that _redirects file based on the urls posted to @Netlify's forms API. This way the redirect happen directly at the CDN level so are crazzzzzy fast. But it's a bit of a toy/example project. https://t.co/p84HJPmcDH
